bill.summary: 12/12/2006--Public Law. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey property in the Mount Rogers National Recreation Area, Smyth County, Virginia, containing the former Konnarock Lutheran Girls School to the Evangelical Lutheran Coalition for Mission in Appalachia. Requires the recipient to accept such property "as is."
